comment.author: 42264328@N00
comment._content: Possibly at the Naval Review 14 October 1912 in New York, where a couple of other photos of US warships in the Bain collection were taken--see comments on photo of the Delaware, for instance. There is a Naval Historical Center page on the Mayflower: USS Mayflower (1898-1931, later PY-1) The ship has a long and fascinating history--see the Wikipedia article.

comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content: White text written backwards on the negative says "Conn Salutes Mayflower"
